website_summaries.verdict: A good budget car amplifier to purchase if you don't want to sacrifice the potential audio quality of the system.
pros: Has a maximum output rating of 1,200 watts
Comes with an independent remote subwoofer control to tailor the bass level to your liking
cons: Audio randomly cuts out in some vehicles

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Should have known better than to buy a Boss amp but i did anyway and now im stuck with the POS.. on the positive side at least it wasnt to expensive. after installing this amp a hidious beep and hum is heard no matter what volume level is set, even with the radio turned off completely if the amp is on you get the noise. Biggest waste of $$.. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Dan foggin

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Amp For Tweeters Or Mids
customer_reviews.text: I love Boss gear. Simple, affordable and performs well. This smaller 2-channel amp is perfect for powering a pair of tweeters. It's small enough to conceal behind a dash or glovebox and can easily be controlled with a separate level control. If you're using this as a primary amp, you may need more power, but as a smaller component amp for highs or midrange, it's perfect...
customer_reviews.author: CC Rider

customer_reviews.title: The Boss R3002 powers my four Boss Elite speakers great!
customer_reviews.text: I was running the stock speakers in my vehicle with a grossly underpowered double-din Anrdoid stereo, I also purchased from Amazon. The stereo on it's own was lacking in power, and my stock speakers were blown. I installed this amp (BOSS Riot - R3002) in my truck to push power to a pair of Boss Elite 6.5" speakers and a pair of Boss Elite 5 3/4" speakers. I'm pleased with the combination - it sounds so much better than before. The amp speaker combination can stand on it's own. Later, I will be adding the Boss Riot 1200 watt amp ( R6002) with a pair of Boss Phantom 10" subwoofers in a custom box, for more bass in my setup.
customer_reviews.author: AllanP

customer_reviews.title: Faulty internally
customer_reviews.text: The amp powers on and works but it definitely doesn't sound good. It has an internal issue causing a ground loop out of the box. Hooked up my buddy's Rockford amp and the buzz and distortion are gone. Not even worth the 40 dollars. I'd rather run it off of my factory setup. Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: biggest piece of crap ever
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. I spent weeks getting my Harley ready for Sturgis bike week and then I finally got around to installing this hunk of crap. I've tried three different grounds, three different RCA cables and two power cables and all I get when I turn the radio on is a loud hum. Complete waste of money. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Klipp Jr.

customer_reviews.title: For the price point this thing is great. Its a $30 amp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this amp against all the woefully negative reviews. There are clearly some seriously inept 'installers' here. No, it will not power your 5000w subs and shake the license plate off you car. For the price point this thing is great. Its a $30 amp, not sure what people expect. I used this to help boost the sound from a cheap Dual head unit and it works great. Make sure you run your RCA cables AWAY FROM ANY POWER WIRES, and use the best insulated cables you can find. Cheap out on your cables or improperly route them and you're gonna have a bad time. Buy this amp to boost your stock radio or a cheap head unit!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Changed to a better brand
customer_reviews.text: Getting some engine noise (well grounded) not sure if its the amp or other issues. Very strong amp for the money Update: I bought 3 of these amps 3 different cars all got engine noise. 2004 dodge ram 2017 Mazda 3 and 2016 civic. I replaced the amp in the civic with a new amp (I upgraded to a $65 amp) and all engine noise was eliminated. It's worth the 30 extra to have it done right the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: I hooked it up to 4 new 6.5 inch kenwood speakers to test it against a similar amp from autotek and it ran short big time. Setup was exactly the same, I only swapped amp. Distortion levels so much higher than on the audiotek, max volume didn't come close. Bass levels very poor unless bass level is all the way up. It might work for a small subwoofer or other speakers but I'll stick with the audiotek and give the boss amp away to a youngster or use it as paperweight..
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: you have to boost up!
customer_reviews.text: Otherwise the speakers and tweeters have not sufficient load and the speakers starting "tossing" very early. Description is explaining to keep the amplifier on low level but that was not working on my case. It is also describing several other and bigger amplifiers details so you have to be careful not becoming confused. Next time would buy a at least a 4 or 6 channel amplifier. It needs to be connected with an additional positive wire to be ignited by the radio. Plastik hose to cover the wiring in the engine bay is way to short.
customer_reviews.author: Christian V.

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back and more!
customer_reviews.text: This amp will make you're speakers sound fuzzy, this product will malfunction within a week, this product was made with cheap parts,yes this product will break for you. Before buying this ask yourself would you rather bya 90$ amp or will you buy this one that will break but before breaking you get to listen to static, buzzing, and something else... a mystery sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: With no low pass filter this amp is more suitable for non subwoofer use
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the device fail to output power on 3 of the 4 channels. It couldn't power a 250w rms Kicker 10in subwoofer. However, Boss vendor support is the best I've seen. I was able to upgrade to an AR1500M mono sub which is doing a good job to power my 500w rms sub.
customer_reviews.author: Matlock

customer_reviews.title: No Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I'd have rated this amp higher except I left an e-mail with Boss asking a question about what size inline fuse to use. The instructions repeately say "fuse" but never say how many amps it's rated at. I must admit I recently e-mailed Power Acoustik with a question and got a same day response with a phone number and a contact name. I wrongly expected the same result from Boss but got ghosted instead. If you're a car sound pro and can install amps without the help or amp rating advice that most installation manuals provide this amp could be for you. If you need the manual for this type of information look for a different brand amp.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Ogule

customer_reviews.title: Bought with Boss 6x9's
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for pushing a set of Boss 6x9's in my wife's car (RCA's from the deck and 12 AWG wires), for the price, it does what it says it will - with the gain set at only 1/3, it gets pretty loud while, to the point we can't hear each other talk.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice amp for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little amp. As others have stated I got the engine noise when truck was running. But if you go through the process of what us causing the noise you can isolate the amp out and see it is not the problem. Mine was coming from my head unit. I installed noise filters on the rca cables and all is right with the world now.
customer_reviews.author: JOSH HALL

customer_reviews.title: Works great and fits behind the dash out of sight
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this behind the dash in my 84 CJ7 so it's out of sight and safe from weather. I'm driving two wakeboard tower 6x9 speakers mounted to the rollbar. The size was perfect to mount where one of the stock dash speakers would have been right next to the stereo. I don't have dash speakers, so that space was open. The sound is great, even in high wind or even a little rain.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Preforms fine and looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The amp is working just fine for me. It's powering subs that require way more watts than 1200 but they still sound great. I like the soft turn in feature plus the remote bass knob is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: IROC Mike

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This Amp is Horrible.!. It overheats really fast and that’s not even having it turned up a quarter of the way up.!. It plays your factory speakers good until it goes into protection mode.!. You get what you pay for and a Cheap Lesson Learned.!.
customer_reviews.author: KVS

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I used this to power a home theater sub-woofer. This thing has guts. I have the gain turned all the way down and my whole bedroom shakes. Very strong little amp, very affordable. I bought mine used and the line level inputs didn't work though, had to use rca plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Fields

customer_reviews.title: Bought something different
customer_reviews.text: It's only been hooked up for about 2 weeks output starting not to put out right went from working and sounding good turn the vehicle on volume lowered on his own and it's not the radio
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Not with it
customer_reviews.text: Getting a A whining noise don’t know what it is everything has been rewired and no deferent it just yeh low quality amp
customer_reviews.author: luis martinez

customer_reviews.title: Unless you go to car audio weekend show off your bad A$$ name brand amp meet the Boss will do just fine with any good head unit.
customer_reviews.text: My over priced name brand car audio 2 channel amp lasted 15 years. The Boss 4 channel car audio amp was a great LOW COST replacement. performs well and sounds just as good as my old one. will it last 15 years? If I had to by a new Boss amp every 5 years, 3 in 15 years I would pay less that 1 new Name brand that I had.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Pro tip
customer_reviews.text: With an amp this cheap, make sure your ground is good. (Common is key) I had to install a ground loop isolator even after i fixed the ground. But seriously easy, ground it to your sub amp and havent had a problem since. Both boss amps and everyone loves my stereo.
customer_reviews.author: William lambrecht

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product looks and feels well made. Plenty of power. I would need to upgrade my speakers to use the full power of it. Sounds pretty sweet with $30 50 watt Dual speakers. Used a $35 Pyle bluetooth for the upfront signal. Bought a $20 amp setup package for good wiring. Music is loud and clear when the pontoon is under full power. Took about 15 minutes to tune it in for the best sound. Pretty kick butt boat system for under $150. Happy Boating East Central Minnesota.
customer_reviews.author: B Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Junk and junk company
customer_reviews.text: This thing is junk. Now i see why people go to the expensive ones. Had my amp go out and seen good reviews about this amp so i got it. Hooked everything up and it is all crackly and popping. Bought a amp from a local store and works perfectly fine. Now they wont let me return it after i just received it in the mail today. Total junk and rip off company..
customer_reviews.author: Andrew2400

customer_reviews.title: Works good for an 8-12inch woofer.
customer_reviews.text: The R4002 works well on my 10" white boy kicker. Plenty of excursion and more power bridged that it can handle. Though it tends to heat up quite a bit, wish there was a fan to cool it in the heatsink vents so because the lack of, I glued 2 small 1 inch fans on in and it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Maines

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: fantastic amp for the price. very well made and amazing sound. the picture shows my set up. all boss equipment except for a few items. speakers,amps and everything else purchased on Amazon. fast shipping and great prices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit bellyaching
customer_reviews.text: You have ground loop noise? Unplug the RCAs at the back of the head unit leaving them in the amp. Did the buzzing stop? Then it's not the amp. This works great to drive door speakers and is fun and cheap way to start learning about car audio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For a cheap amplifier it does the job. I ...
customer_reviews.text: For a cheap amplifier it does the job. I do get some noise under no volume, no input conditions. Remember you get what you pay for. If I needed another cheap amp I would buy again. If you looking for high power high quality amplifier spend the money on a high end amp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little amp
customer_reviews.text: Great amp using it for my door panel speakers and my rear 6x9s and its verynloud and clear. Was very hesitant to purchase this thought it was going to be junk. I wouldn't suggest it for lows tho..
customer_reviews.author: nicolaus gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: BOSS has a NO return policy.
customer_reviews.text: Audio installer told me these are known to not work are very cheaply made. I wish I would have asked before I bought it. BOSS has a NO return policy, when it didn't work I was out the $$$.
customer_reviews.author: m jage

customer_reviews.title: Works great long as its not bridged
customer_reviews.text: I have the 1100watt in my truck pushing two boss 10s love it no problems at all so i purchased the 1200watt for my jeep have 1 single 12" sub i hooked it up bridged the amp sub hit amazeing very hard actually blew my box apart then it went into protect mode cut it off back on soon as it hits goes into protect even with everything turned down so i unbridged the amp it it works fine the one in my truck is bridged always has been
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Only 30 day warranty???  Are you kidding
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Amp for my sons truck and he is in college I got it for Xmas and did not get a chance to install it until he came home due to the pandemic Well spent a few hours installing it to find that it would not power on unless you wiggle the fuse and it only has 30 day return so I have a junk amp that I can’t return
customer_reviews.author: Larry Davis

customer_reviews.title: A buy, A Very Worthwhile Buy
customer_reviews.text: I've used a 1000 watt Boss subwoofer attached to this, along with other speakers and this thing has only gotten warm. It puts out power and can very much take a beating. You don't need a kicker amp, just buy this beast. You won't regret it at all
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t not buy !!! Horrible engine whine no matter what you do !
customer_reviews.text: Installed this amp to four 6.5 door speakers and it had a horrible engine whine ! I installed all wires correctly(separated rcas and power cable) . Re grounded in better location and still whines . Was about to tear my whole truck apart this weekend and start over but then I started going through the reviews on amazon and realized that it’s the amp ! Save your time and money ! DO NOT BUY !
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Olivo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one week
customer_reviews.text: Within a week of ordering the product two of the channels stopped working when I consulted with Amazon to return the product they said that it was a safety issue why I could not return the product. While it worked it was a decent product
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bad product can’t return
customer_reviews.text: This product was not good at all it had a lot of feed back and now we can’t return it. We spent Ali most 100 dollars what a high mistake vert disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Still

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: this junk makes a big whining sound as soon as you connect it , through it in the trash as amazon didn't even want nothing to do with this junk
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the engine noise
customer_reviews.text: Besides the package, everything else just didn’t work. Straight out the box it had the worst engine noise ever. The grounding on this is garbage.save your money and buy a pioneer or kenwood those are reliable amps.This will be my last time purchasing any boss products.
customer_reviews.author: Make you def

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This design and quality of boss amplifier is simply amazing. Never overheated, never shut off amazing power and low power consumption. I would recommend this to music lovers for any vehicle to may your vehicle louder.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran Khan

customer_reviews.title: Does not make anywhere near rated power.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't make anywhere near it's rated power. sounds like garbage. went into protect mode almost instantly, and It's not returnable to Amazon. Save your money and pick something else. this amp is so cheap and light it feels like it's going to blow away.
customer_reviews.author: anony mouse

customer_reviews.title: The one I received was either defective or it is ...
customer_reviews.text: The one I received was either defective or it is not shielded well enough. I had to move it away from my engine because it would distort the sound when my engine was running. Also whenever I drove near a radio tower, it would cause loud static sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Kase

customer_reviews.title: Weak amplifier
customer_reviews.text: Very weak! Can’t even power two speakers or two subs on the same channel. Boss is very weak when it comes to amplifiers
customer_reviews.author: Cesar.Fastang25

customer_reviews.title: Half of the Amp did not work.
customer_reviews.text: The problem I had with the AMP was 2 of the channels did not work, the speaker output plug for channels 1 & 2 was dead. I could plug into channels 3 & 4 with the 1 & 2 plug and make them work so half was dead. I tried to get another amp R1004 but they were out of stock. They refunded my money and I purchased a Pyle Amp and it works fine. Dennis N.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis N.

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't recommend it
customer_reviews.text: It states 1000watts but cant handle half of that. I have it at half of the output and it keeps going into protection. I would not recommend it to anyone. I was hoping fot Boss to have leveled their amps up but nope. They still cant put out what they claim.
customer_reviews.author: Raul barragan

customer_reviews.title: Also engine noise level is really bad. I've install lots of amp prior but this ...
customer_reviews.text: This product arrive with 2 out 4 channels works, and they don't except return. Also engine noise level is really bad. I've install lots of amp prior but this one is the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Trung

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound quality
customer_reviews.text: It has no filter so when you hit the gas in your car, you will hear a pitch the faster you go. Also it has 4 rca ports which limits you to only one amplifier per car, which complicates things because most tuners use this app for speakers and also another more powerful amp for the subwoofers. I recommend getting a more powerful two channel amp to run four speakers and wire two speakers at each port.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall
customer_reviews.text: Good product overall, screw terminals are a little too tight together and can sometimes cause you a little frustration but so far this is serving it's intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Lane's Surveillance Systems

customer_reviews.title: It works fine
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly fine on my civics jbl’s and pioneer deck. there is a humming noise when you turn up your volume too loud, I dont care for loud beat so you can level out your volumes/settings to remove that humming noise
customer_reviews.author: Adrian h.

customer_reviews.title: Great little amp (died)
customer_reviews.text: Update.item won't stay on. Arrived with 7.5amp fuse. Blown. Changed fused and wired battery cables, fuse blew out again, increased fuse size, blew out again..I dont understand??..I have other low cost amps that works fine from amazon Great little amp for tweeters and PA horn for outdoor music.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: turned on, no sound, replaced with rockford fosgate ...
customer_reviews.text: turned on, no sound, replaced with rockford fosgate 200 watt. sound. I uninstalled and reinstalled the wiring a thousand times and still no sound on this unit
customer_reviews.author: DenDog

customer_reviews.title: Amp doesn't turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Watch out for no return policy. Amp didn't work right out of the box. Fuse is good, power on input and rem. No sound no nothing. Waiting on response from seller before I take it apart. Hopefully I at least get a working product not bought as is.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Carver

customer_reviews.title: This amp is seriously over-rated
customer_reviews.text: after a short time of playing gets hot and turns off due to protection mode. Four 10's at a 2 ohm load. Don't even hit that hard...Pretty weak for a "1200 watt" amp. Maybe this amp would be fine for some 6x9's
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B. Baker

customer_reviews.title: J. Burns
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Really nice power for what I need did. I am impressed so far. It's only been a couple of weeks (12/23/2019).
customer_reviews.author: J. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase possible
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely is the worst amp I ever bought I'll never buy another one nor recommend it to anyone. First thing they sent me a used amp it had copper strands in the terminals from previous installation. Second it barely has any power, you almost cant tell it's on at max power
customer_reviews.author: Justin David Evans

customer_reviews.title: Static, crap amp spend the money on a name brand
customer_reviews.text: The amp is absolute crap you get a static sound no matter what you do and yes it was hooked up properly and I even tried swapping the wiring with one of my other 3 amps that have no static speaker ground positive rca even remote and the static was still on this amp Amazon was able to get the item refunded so thank you for amazing costumer service Amazon as always
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price get professional setup
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a while, good value for the money but recommend spending the extra for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound quality!  Picks up ever little bit of system noise.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product, signal was poor and made a lot of background noise. Mine may have been defective but it costs more to ship back then it does to just buy it again. I highly recommend going with somthing else don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Rob on the Job

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like crap!! Don't buy. Made a pair of kicker 6x9's sound horrible. Not eligible for refund. Beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Mabri222

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I received my amplifier and went to have it professionally installed and the amplifier did not work!
customer_reviews.author: zzziiinnnggg

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Tolerate Supply Ripple
customer_reviews.text: Supply voltage ripple causes a nasty hum on the output, to the point of being unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Roger Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Great amp for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great amp for the price. I have a single 12 inch sub and this powers it beautifully, the remote bass knob is awesome giving the ability to adjust the bass for every song by simply turning the knob on my dash. Great product would definitely rocommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It work good.
customer_reviews.text: Its “okay” if you’re on a budget. I power 4 boss 6x9 speakers. It has 4 channels. No hiss or hum if you hook it up correctly. Not recommended for subwoofers.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, reliable for over 4 years now.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this amp for a long time. The price is great, and the sound quality is great. I have had no issues as long as i properly car for and properly set up the amp.
customer_reviews.author: cdog1977

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend spending more for the better one
customer_reviews.text: I spent days trying to install this in my 2000 Camaro with aftermarket Speakers. Rewired the entire car twice and kept having issues, had to buy RCA noise helpers and the sound still wasn’t that loud.
customer_reviews.author: Max Reznichenko

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. Wiring kit would be helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, easy to hook up. Reminder to connect rem connection to + terminal for power. ALSO, I asked a question about running an MP3 player directly from this unit. You CAN do this with an RCA Y adapter to 3.5 mm. Sounds good. Not as much volume control as I would like, but you can do it.
customer_reviews.author: THOM

customer_reviews.title: Bad ground noise
customer_reviews.text: Bad ground noise! I tried all the tricks to cancel it out but only lowered its effect. I ended up using a different amp without any noise.
customer_reviews.author: Tate Chmielewski

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 1 week and stopped checked all connection still doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: nadine holland

customer_reviews.title: garbage didnt work at all
customer_reviews.text: got a refund really check the comments on this before buying
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Weigner

customer_reviews.title: Decent power great value
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised I’m using it to power my mids and tweets with bass blockers in line but have a sub with amp also for the bass
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Amp
customer_reviews.text: Great Amp, Had it for almost 3 years and shes still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: This thing hums
customer_reviews.text: horrible amp, hums no matter what i did to the point that i had to take it out. really better off spending more to get a reputable amp if you want clear sound
customer_reviews.author: JACK WRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Caught fire inside
customer_reviews.text: It worked for 2 weeks with a lot of engine noise. After 2 weeks i got in my car started the car and on volume 1 on my stereo the amp started smoking. I had to rip out the wires and could barely touch the amp. It was red hot. It almost burned my car down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!!💥
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of negative reviews about this amp.. but for me this app was perfect for and what I was looking for to run my inside speakers. I don't have engine whine.. no distorted sound. Everything depends on the adjustment of your head unit volume and adjusting the gain to the amp to match the output. Solid little amp that runs my highs and mids.
customer_reviews.author: Julius Washington

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!🌟
customer_reviews.text: Price was excellent, shipped on time, I'm using it on my one 1200 watts-8 inch subwoofer🔊and it sounds beautiful, crisp, deep bass. No problem so far. I'm happy. ✌🎅 Be safe & Happy Holidays!
customer_reviews.author: KDZ

customer_reviews.title: Subs
customer_reviews.text: What kind of subs can be used with this amp?
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Works great and bridgable.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a 600 watt 12 “Kicker Solobaric sub and it powers it great. Sound seems pretty clean. The unit seems sturdy. I bridged it to 600 Watts.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne E Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Car Amp
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, trying to figure out how to ground unit, humming sound coming through speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Foolio

customer_reviews.title: Solid! (Edit:It is solid, but very misrepresented.)
customer_reviews.text: make sure that if you are planning on bridging, buy an adapter to use both RCA inputs! EDIT: 1/1/15 So I dropped my review from 5 stars to 2, mostly because the features that are shown in the pictures are not what are included on the actual product. This is just a simple amp, not highpass or lowpass, nothing of that nature.
customer_reviews.author: THeONlyReviewerYOuSHouldTRust

customer_reviews.title: System sounds great. Amplifier is a lot bigger then I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: System sounds great. Amplifier is a lot bigger then I thought it would be. Directions not the best. So far so good. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: WAS BURNT WHEN I GOT IT....
customer_reviews.text: BOGUS SENT A RAGG TAGG WITH 3&4 CHANNELS NOT WORK might be done with Boss 000000 Cramps
customer_reviews.author: MyG*Black

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install & the company services were amazing. Shipped super fast. For the price you cannot beat this. I am surprised with the quality and the power this amp has to offer. I am happy with the product and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emo martinez

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Stable
customer_reviews.text: A tough workhorse amp in a compact size that is not skimped on. I have 2 of these, 1 for rear speakers and 1 for subwoofer. A solid product.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Tecza

customer_reviews.title: get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: the only thing I liked about the amp was it's small size I could hide it anywhere. What I didn't like about it was the engine sound coming through the speakers from the amp I bought all kinds of filters but nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: trucker0145

customer_reviews.title: Pleased thus far.
customer_reviews.text: Its a good amp pushing 2- 10" Alpine type-e subs. The auxillary knob doesnt seem to work though...
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S

customer_reviews.title: Great amp, Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This amp works amazing, I haven't had one problem with it at all! I have 2 10" Pioneer, dual voice coil, 4 ohm subwoofers, and i have them bridged running at 900w, and it works great! At first I was questioning it because it was a little on the cheaper side, but it is one of the best amps I've had, and I definitely recommend this brand to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Paired with 4 Rockford speakers. They sound awesome! Make sure to have a good ground!!! It's more important than you think.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Displeased
customer_reviews.text: It has a lot of noise feed coming into the speakers so I replaced all of the wires and re ran the ones that might have been near the power wire and still had a lot of noise feed coming in. Then I put a different amp in and fixed the problem. It does sound good when turned up but anything low volume is terrible
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect for the sound i needed without the massive price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t really work for what I needed them for (mids)
customer_reviews.author: Deondra

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Had a factory sound system in a 2003 Honda Civic EX, wanted a little more ‘umph,’ nothing overpowering, and this definitely helped! Hooked it up to a 300watt speaker and it is sounds great. Came quickly, easily installed. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Missy M

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for buck.
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. Used the high level inputs from a retrosound headunit, for a 4 speaker setup in my 67 camaro, good clear sound. Would 100% buy again. Highly reccomend for any low-medium power speaker set ups.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: It only worked for 2 almost 3 weeks. Amazon gave me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Lance

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have this pushing a 4 ohm component in back & front 4 ohm 3 ways on doors. Sounds great I have 2 amp setup to get power I need to push everything.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Giving atleast two stars because I needed a cheap one to replace my old one for the time being. Long story short there is a lot of engine noise and don’t buy a cheap amp.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work faulty
customer_reviews.text: Amp didn't work out of the box, my wires were installed professional just a month ago and tried a different amp and it worked fine but the boss amp doesn't work I checked the fuse and everything and still nothing
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small, but makes speakers buzz with no sound and makes speakers pop of I turn on ACC mode before starting car right away.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i think its to small of an amp to run what i have
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price point. Overall I am definitely happy with the product and their service.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Aungst

customer_reviews.title: It worked great for the first 40 minutes and then after that ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about a week ago to power either a single BOB 10 inch sub woofer or two pyramid 10 inch subwoofers. It worked great for the first 40 minutes and then after that it threw a protection light and wont wont work now. I have had this amp for about 2 months now and its blown 4 subwoofers...this is absolutely garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Build quality seems good. Sound is good. However I would not recommend using this for a sub. It does not have power it claims. No bridge option.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Wade

product_meta.title: BOSS Audio Systems R6002 - Riot 1200 Watt, 2 Channel, 2 4 Ohm Stable Class AB, Full Range, Bridgeable, Mosfet Car Amplifier with Remote Subwoofer Control
product_meta.description: Style:1200 Watt 2 ChannelDrive your in-vehicle audio experience up a level with the Boss Audio Riot R1002 Class A/B 2-Channel Full Range Amplifier. This 2-Ohm stable amplifier features 600 Watts Max Power with a MOSFET power supply to pump out your playlists. Customize the sound with Fixed High Pass Crossover, Variable Low Pass Crossover and Bass Boost. Control those Bass vibes with the Remote Subwoofer Control. Bridge channels for more power and flexibility. Amplifiers in the Riot Series are perfect for first time car audio buyers looking to add Bass, enhanced sound and performance to their system at an affordable price. Get your vehicle rocking with the Boss Audio R3002. For further product details, please scroll down.
feature_bullets: 600 W MAX Power @ 2 Ohm x 2 Channels
300 W MAX Power @ 4 Ohm x 2 Channels
1200 W MAX Bridged Power @ 4 Ohm x 1 Channels
Full-Range, Class A/B Topology, MOSFET Power Supply
Low and High Level Inputs, Variable Filter, Variable Bass Boost
Remote Subwoofer Control, Red LED Backlit Illumination
Dimensions: Depth 12.2” x Width 10.4” x Height 2.3”
